results.title: The Clown of God (K)
results.creator_credit: Gary McGivney, Ernest Troost, Morton Schindel and Weston Woods Studios
results.brief_description: A beautifully filmed adaptation of the Tomi de Paola story about Giovanni, the clown who juggled for a living during the Middle Ages. Now, old and penniless, he returns to his birthplace seeking refuge in the church on Christmas Eve. Watching the procession of gifts for the Holy Child, he offers the only gift he has - one last performance. Suitable for middle and upper primary level.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Gary McGivney, Ernest Troost, Morton Schindel and Weston Woods Studios

results.title: The Cline Affair (TEFC)
results.brief_description: Brings into sharp focus the difficult ethical and moral questions surrounding the burgeoning field of genetic manipulation. The intrigue which cloaked the affair is investigated and the uncertain future of gene therapy is examined

results.title: The Clay circus
results.creator_credit: Herman J. Engel and Texture Films
results.brief_description: Captures, without narration, the spirit of the circus. A clay sculpture, by Shay Rieger, inspired by the color, forms, and motions of the circus, are intercut with segments of actual circus acts.

results.title: The Classic guitar: a miniature orchestra
results.creator_credit: Lee R. Bobker, Nina Collier, Arts and Audiences and Dynamic Films
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Music for Young People”.
Discusses and demonstrates the use of the versatility of the guitar and explains how colour and other effects are produced. Features Rey de la Torre.

results.title: The city that waits to die
results.brief_description: SUMMARY: An alert from scientists concerned with a catastrophic fate for San Francisco based on earthquake conditions presented by the San Andreas fault. Includes scenes of earthquakes and describes some of the radical experiments being conducted in starting and stopping earthquakes.
results.description: SUMMARY: An alert from scientists concerned with a catastrophic fate for San Francisco based on earthquake conditions presented by the San Andreas fault. results.title: The City of the future
results.creator_credit: Art Ciocco, Edmund Bacon and Urban Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Understanding Cities”.
A documentary that looks at the future design and development of the cities in the world. Factors that will influence these future designs include the limited amounts of energy and resources that are left in the world. Narrated by Edmund Bacon.

results.title: The City of Chromatic Dissolution
results.brief_description: In three-colour separation studies of the CBD of Melbourne shot in 1986 on very outdated rolls of Ilford Pan F black-and-white negative, evidence of chemical dissolution appears as cyan, magenta and yellow spots on the colour prints.

constellations_other.name: Communicating colour
constellations_other.description: An exploration of colour on-screen inspired by Technicolor supervisor, Natalie Kalmus.

results.description: In three-colour separation studies of the CBD of Melbourne shot in 1986 on very outdated rolls of Ilford Pan F black and white negative, evidence of chemical dissolution appears as cyan, magenta and yellow spots on the colour prints. The other ‘dissolution’ - the 3-colour separation and reconstitution of the colour of the image - shows in the pedestrian and motor traffic activity, and also in the mirror-facaded ‘invisible’ office buildings in St Kilda Road. The film is accompanied by layers of city sounds and electronically altered bowed glass effects.
description_for_label: In three-colour separation studies of the CBD of Melbourne shot in 1986 on very outdated rolls of Ilford Pan F black and white negative, evidence of chemical dissolution appears as cyan, magenta and yellow spots on the colour prints. The other ‘dissolution’ - the 3-colour separation and reconstitution of the colour of the image - shows in the pedestrian and motor traffic activity, and also in the mirror-facaded ‘invisible’ office buildings in St Kilda Road. The film is accompanied by layers of city sounds and electronically altered bowed glass effects.

results.title: The City of Adelaide
results.brief_description: Provides a survey of Adelaide, with reference to its history, buildings, primary and secondary industries, transport, port facilities, public utilities and recreational and cultural amenities.
